info.name: SubSilver - Dark
info.description: by grom. Dark style for SubSilver phpBB forums: AutoHotkey forum ( http://ahkscript.org/boards/ ) Tab Mix Plus forum ( http://tmp.garyr.net/forum/ ) Puppy Linux forum ( http://www.murga-linux.com/puppy/ and http://murga-linux.com/puppy/ ) Project Perfect Mod ( http://www.ppmsite.com/forum/ ) DOS tips ( http://www.dostips.com/forum/ ) A helping user script: https://greasyfork.org/scripts/7999-grom-phpbb-forum-helper
info.additionalInfo: License: GPL version 2. Images are created by Christian Bullock and released under GPL version 2. A couple of embedded images are in Public Domain. Dark style for phpBB proSilver, proBlue, proDark themes: https://userstyles.org/styles/95077/ (style 95077)
